StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProgramBookGroupsForSearch]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID integer = 0, @Title varchar(50) = null, @Descrip.on varchar(50) = null, @Keywords varchar(50) = null, @OrderBy varchar(50) = 'PG.DisplayOrder' ) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @orgCnt int
CREATE table #org1(organiza.on_id int) CREATE table #org2(organiza.on_id int) CREATE table #org3(organiza.on_id int)
IF @orgid > 0 BEGIN
insert into #org1(organiza.on_id) values(@orgid) select @orgCnt = organiza.on_id from #org1 while(@orgCnt > 0) begin insert into #org2(organiza.on_id) select organiza.on_id from #org1
insert into #org3(organiza.on_id) select organiza.on_id from #org1
delete from #org1 insert into #org1(organiza.on_id) select parent_organiza.on_id from [mcriss].[dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] where child_organiza.on_id in (select organiza.on_id from #org2) delete from #org2 select @orgCnt = count(*) from #org1 end END
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @SQLString NVARCHAR(1500) DECLARE @WhereClause NVARCHAR(1000)
SET @SQLString = 'SELECT DISTINCT PG.ID, PG.Name, PG.Organiza.onId, PG.DisplayOrder FROM USMC.ProgramDocument P JOIN USMC.ProgramDocumentGroup PG ON (PG.ID = P.ProgramDocumentGroupID) '
SET @WhereClause = 'WHERE (1=1) '
if @OrgID IS NOT NULL AND @OrgID != 0 SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND (Organiza.onId IN (select organiza.on_id from #org3) or Organiza.onId is null)'
if @Title IS NOT NULL AND @Title != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND Title = ''' + @Title + ''''
if @Descrip.on IS NOT NULL AND @Descrip.on != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND Descrip.on = ''' + @Descrip.on + ''''
if @Keywords IS NOT NULL AND @Keywords != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' AND Keywords = ''' + @Keywords + ''''
if @OrderBy IS NOT NULL AND @OrderBy != '' SET @WhereClause = @WhereClause + ' ORDER BY '+@OrderBy
SET @SQLString = @SQLString + @WhereClause
EXEC sp_executesql @SQLString
END
drop table #org1 drop table #org2 drop table #org3
SET NOCOUNT OFF
